scriptedContentFragment.name: Document Viewer Administration
scriptedContentFragment.contentScript:
#set ($listId = $core_v2_widget.UniqueId('list'))
#set ($documents = $context.List("", 5, 0))
    $core_v2_widget.ExecuteFile('list.vm')
#registerEndOfPageHtml('telligent.evolution.widgets.documentViewerAdmin') #end #registerEndOfPageHtml() #end
scriptedContentFragment.languageResources: <language key="en-us"> <resource name="All">All Documents</resource> <resource name="Cancel">Cancel Processing</resource> <resource name="Converted">Processed</resource> <resource name="deleteConfirm">Are you sure you want to cancel processing of this document?</resource> <resource name="documents">Documents</resource> <resource name="DocumentViewerStatus_Description">Supports administration of viewable documents.</resource> <resource name="DocumentViewerStatus_Name">Document Viewer Administration</resource> <resource name="Download">Download</resource> <resource name="Error">Error</resource> <resource name="NotConverted">Not Processed</resource> <resource name="reconvert">Reprocess</resource> <resource name="reconvertConfirm">Are you sure you want to reprocess?</resource> <resource name="Status">Status</resource> <resource name="View">View</resource> </language>
